_header: Thinken how swart thing and sooty is the sin
_description: A moral warning, inserted into a life of St. Margaret

Bod34.Transcription:
þenchen hu swart þing & suti is þe
                    sunneþenchen of helle ƿa & of heoueriche
                    ƿunneHare ahne deað & drihtenes munegin ful
                    ilome& te grisle & te grure þet bið et te dome

Mack,  Frances May,
                        ed.  
             Seinte Marherete….
EETS
         o.s. 193 (1934); repr. 1990: 34.
